allow: Bash(timeout 5 powershell -Command "Start-Process -FilePath ''./firescrew_multistream.exe'' -WindowStyle Hidden; Start-Sleep 3; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3099/api/camera/32010000001320000999_32010000001320000123'' -Method Get")

Bash(timeout 5 powershell -Command "Start-Process -FilePath ''./firescrew_multistream.exe'' -WindowStyle Hidden; Start-Sleep 3; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3099/api/camera/45102700411117000020_45102700411317000021'' -Method Get")

Bash(timeout 5 powershell -Command "Start-Process -FilePath ''./firescrew_multistream.exe'' -WindowStyle Hidden; Start-Sleep 3; Write-Host ''测试存在的摄像头ID:'' -ForegroundColor Green; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3099/api/camera/45102700411117000020_45102700411317000021'' -Method Get; Write-Host ''''; Write-Host ''测试不存在的摄像头ID:'' -ForegroundColor Red; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3099/api/camera/nonexistent123'' -Method Get")
